channel.title: Lifestyle on Kris Wu's Humble Site

item.title: Fuel efficiency and engine
item.description: Although intuitive, one may conduct a statistical analysis on how engine size impact fuel efficiency. In order to do that, we must first call out the packages. Load packages # Load ggplot2, dplyr, and all the other tidyverse packages library(tidyverse) library(mosaic) library(lubridate) library(fivethirtyeight) Glimpse Dataframe Next, it is good practice to take a look at the dataframe mpg using a glimpse function # Have a look at how the dataframe is structured glimpse(mpg) ## Rows: 234 ## Columns: 11 ## $ manufacturer <chr> "audi", "audi", "audi", "audi", "audi", "audi", "audi", … ## $ model <chr> "a4", "a4", "a4", "a4", "a4", "a4", "a4", "a4 quattro", … ## $ displ <dbl> 1.
